site_name: Former Poplar Bus Depot, Leven Road, London, E14 0LN
description: Application for non-material amendment of planning permission dated 14/10/2020, ref: PA/19/02148. Non Material Amendment(s) Sought:Minor internal alterations and flexibility to the use of ground floor unit NR05 to additionally include Residential Amenity and Workspace (investor employees) and Residents' Workspace.Minor internal alterations and flexibility to the use of ground floor unit NR10 to additionally include Residential Amenity, including a Residents' Gym.Minor internal alterations and flexibility to the use of ground floor Core C Residents Lounge to additionally include Workspace.Re-allocation of the Affordable Workspace provision from NR10 to NR03 (double height ground and first floor unit), with the retained provision of 22% affordable workspace across the whole development.
